case.title: Try Dating A Singer - 18 (United States)
case.text:
Hi . I live in U.S.A , but what i want is a Uk man to come meet me so how awsome t is to date an amreican girl , who is also a singer, i will sing to my man all the time . I just wanna marry a british man . is been a dream forever
email me and i will send you all the pics you want .im verry actracive
